pullrequest.title: Teleop of a team of Jackal, Husky, and Iris (in a dark lava tube)

content.raw: Could we keep the previous `.launch` files and create a single one `robot_team.launch` \(plus all the helper launch files, if needed\)? It might be interesting to preserve the old simple behavior where only one robot is spawned.
content.html: Could we keep the previous .launch files and create a single one robot_team.launch (plus all the helper launch files, if needed)? It might be interesting to preserve the old simple behavior where only one robot is spawned.
